                theme(text = element_text(size = 12),

```{r data, include=FALSE}
# sum of species
shp <- st_read("../Data/richness_effort_v13_total_1km_urb_f1km_30min_10spp.shp")
cdata <- shp

# Rename columns
cdata <- cdata %>% 
  rename(
    lpi_f = X1_lpi,
    lpi_h = X2_lpi,
    ed_f = X1_ed,
    ed_h = X2_ed,
    contig_f = X1_contig,
    contig_h = X2_contig,
    plant_f = X1_pland,
    pland_h = X2_pland,
    nlsi_f = X1_nlsi,
    nlsi_h = X2_nlsi,
    te_f = X1_te,
    te_h = X2_te,
    np_f = X1_np,
    np_h = X2_np,
    area_mn_f = X1_area_mn,
    area_mn_h = X2_area_mn,
    lpi_s = lpi_total,
    ed_s = ed_total,
    contig_s = contig_tot,
    pland_s = pland_tota,
    nlsi_s = nlsi_total,
    te_s = te_total,
    np_s = np_total,
    area_mn_s = area_mn_to,
    HISTO_NO = HISTO_NODA
  )

# Create columns
cdata <- cdata %>% 
  mutate(
    area_mn_m = (area_mn_f + area_mn_h) / 2,
    lpi_m = (lpi_f + lpi_h) / 2,
    ed_m = (ed_f + ed_h) / 2,
    contig_m = (contig_f + contig_h) / 2,
    pland_m = (plant_f + pland_h) / 2,
    nlsi_m = (nlsi_f + nlsi_h) / 2,
    te_m = (te_f + te_h) / 2,
    np_m = (np_f + np_h) / 2
  )

```
